```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(maps)
```


## Read map data
```{r}
world_map = map_data('world')
```

## plot a basic world map
```{r}
ggplot(world_map, aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group))+
  geom_polygon()+
  theme_classic()
```
